text:
Due the module structur changes the server status didnt work anymore. I have
created a fix for this, that will call the status.xml correct.
creator: oliver.schalch@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 18563
fix for serverstatus

patch for serverStatus.jx, removes obsolete usecase.xmap and adds the
sitemap.xmap for the status.xml
